libclc
======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which libclc installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using libclc, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load libclc/20.1.8-GCCcore-14.3.0
```
